Monitor and interpret AI trends.tier3_description: The ability to establish processes and mechanisms for monitoring market and industry trends regarding the use of AI (e.g., use cases, case studies).

Develop and manage AI use-case portfolio.tier3_capability: Assess and prioritize AI use cases
Develop and manage AI use-case portfolio.tier3_description: This capability involves systematically evaluating and ranking AI use cases based on dimensions such as risk, value, effort, complexity and feasibility. It ensures that resources are allocated to the most impactful and viable projects.

Develop external partnerships and allian.tier3_capability: Assess and monitor capabilities of ecosystem partners and prospects
Develop external partnerships and allian.tier3_description: The ability to evaluate and continuously monitor the skills, resources and performance of external partners within the AI ecosystem. This includes ensuring that these partners meet the organization's standards and can effectively contribute to achieving strategic AI objectives.

Manage culture and change for/due to AI.tier3_capability: Execute change management and culture initiatives
Manage culture and change for/due to AI.tier3_description: The abilty to develop change management competencies and to monitor their sucess by setting and tracking change management KPIs.

Create, maintain and evolve AI governanc.tier3_capability: Develop AI ethics frameworks, policies and controls
Create, maintain and evolve AI governanc.tier3_description: The ability to create, maintain, and enforce AI governance controls and policies by defining and refining ethics models, aligning with stakeholders and developing detailed ethical policy specifications for governance oversight.

Design and architect AI applications and.tier3_capability: Establish, evolve and optimize AI architecture and infrastructure
Design and architect AI applications and.tier3_description: Develop and manage an end-to-end AI architecture to support the design, development and operation of AI models and solutions. This includes data sourcing and preparation, model training and calibration, model/solution evaluation/testing, model deployment, and model monitoring/management. Strategically manage and optimize AI platforms and enabling infrastructure (e.g., cloud ecosystem) for continuous performance, security monitoring and alignment with business requirements to ensure cost efficiency, speed and security.

Acquire and prepare AI data.tier3_description: The ability to acquire data for AI projects including sourcing, synthetic data creation and collection (webscraping, sensor, API).
